Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
stands \stands\ n. a structure (often made of wood and sometimes temporary) with seats or benches where people can sit to watch an event (such as a game or parade).
Syn: stand [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]
stands n : tiered seats consisting of a structure (often made of wood) where people can sit to watch an event (game or parade) [syn: {stand}]
